findings.headline: Additional coverage of Coinbase AI agent wallets and Base App pivot
findings.details: Mainstream payment news outlet PYMNTS covering the agentic wallet launch. References 'Payments MCP' launched last year as precursor. Base Creator Rewards officially ends this week with final payouts Feb 18.
findings.relevance: Confirmation that yesterday's news is getting broader coverage. No new developments.

findings.headline: Base $15.2B trading boom mentioned in analysis
findings.details: Reference to Base's trading volume growth amid L2 token discussion.

summary: No major new developments since 04:21 scout. Follow-up coverage confirming Coinbase AI agent wallets and Base App pivot. Creator Rewards officially ending Feb 18.
